faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Common questions about the JSON translation tool

items.question: What does this tool do?
items.answer: This is an AI-powered JSON internationalization translation tool that helps developers quickly translate JSON language files into multiple languages while maintaining JSON structure integrity.

items.question: How to use this tool?
items.answer:
1. Upload your JSON file for translation
2. Select target languages
3. Enter your OpenAI API Key
4. Click start translation
5. Download results after translation is complete

items.question: What languages are supported?
items.answer: Currently supports multiple languages including English, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Japanese, Korean, French, German, Spanish, Russian, and more.

items.question: Will my API Key be saved?
items.answer: No. Your API Key is only used temporarily in the browser and will not be saved or transmitted to any servers.

items.question: How is translation quality assured?
items.answer: We use OpenAI's GPT model for translation, ensuring accuracy of technical terms and natural language expression. We also support custom dictionary functionality to maintain consistency of specific terminology.

items.question: Is there a file size limit?
items.answer: Single JSON file size is limited to 10MB. For larger files, it's recommended to split them and translate in batches.

cta.title: Start Using AI Translation Tool Now
cta.description: Quickly and accurately translate your JSON language files into multiple languages
